Jx.Formatter.Currency

Extends: Jx.Formatter.Number

This class formats numbers as US currency.  It actually runs the value through Jx.Formatter.Number first and then updates the returned value as currency.

Example

MooTools.lang Keys
  • ’formatter.currency’.sign

Functions

Functions



format

Takes a number and formats it as currency.
Parameters
valuethe number to format



changeText
changeText: function (lang)
This method should be overridden by subclasses.  It should be used to change any language specific default text that is used by the widget.
Parameters
langthe language being changed to or that had it’s data set of translations changed.
